PDB module¶

This module implements functions to visualize the program’s results with PyMol. It generates a PDB file and a .pml file.

src.pdb.write_pdb(pdb_file, points_membrane_1, points_membrane_2)¶

Copy the original pdb into a new file and write the coordinates of DUM atoms to visualize the membranes

Returns:
file: New PDB file with DUM atoms simulating the membranes
src.pdb.write_pml_script(sphere_point, pdb_file)¶

Write a small PyMol script to visualize the best line
